definition.script: node('jenkinsSlave1'){ stage("Clair_Scanning"){ sh ''' export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin docker run -d --name db arminc/clair-db sleep 15 # wait for db to come up docker run -p 6060:6060 --link db:postgres -d --name clair arminc/clair-local-scan sleep 1 DOCKER_GATEWAY=$(docker network inspect bridge --format "{{range .IPAM.Config}}{{.Gateway}}{{end}}") wget -qO clair-scanner https://github.com/arminc/clair-scanner/releases/download/v8/clair-scanner_linux_amd64 && chmod +x clair-scanner ./clair-scanner --ip="$DOCKER_GATEWAY" registry.mobiledgex.net:5000/mobiledgex/edge-cloud:latest || exit 0 ''' } }
